channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress PDF Light Viewer Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress PDF Light Viewer Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-24684|2024-08-03T19:42:16.127Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20pdf%20light%20viewer%20plugin
item.description: The WordPress PDF Light Viewer Plugin WordPress plugin before 1.4.12 allows users with Author roles to execute arbitrary OS command on the server via OS Command Injection when invoking Ghostscript.
